lines.text: I want my family to be well established. Joseph, particularly. The rest must wait until the victorious culmination of my campaign in Italy.
And you think you can do with people precisely what you want? That life is as you say it is?
Have you ever heard of a thing called destiny, Désirée?
You will enjoy life in Sweden, madame. Stockholm is called the Venice of the north.

[Shivering]
I prefer the Venice of the south!

[after Desiree dozes off during a boring concert]
I will tell you, my dear daughter, how a Crown Princess of Sweden does not behave. A Crown Princess does *not* fall asleep in public. At court functions, she remains awake and converses, graciously.

[shouting over an icy wind as they dock in Stockholm]
I hope we get indoors soon, Jean-Baptiste! I've worn all my warmest underthings and I'm still freezing!
[Her husband raises his eyebrows, a bit shocked but obviously amused]
Don't worry, no one's going to pull up my skirts and look!
